name: CocktailExpert
0:
”Alexa, open Cocktail Expert.”
”Alexa, ask Cocktail Expert how do I make a long island iced tea?”
”Alexa, ask Cocktail Expert to suggest a random cocktail.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cocktail expert
des: Cocktail Expert has step by step voice instructions for all IBA cocktails and some popular cocktails, plus recipe cards for many others. You can also ask it to suggest random cocktails if you're not sure what you're in the mood for. Can't find a cocktail you're looking for or want to give feedback? Send an e-mail to cocktail_expert@outlook.com or just say something like "you don't have a Long Island Iced Tea".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
